title: Espire Hospitality Group to launch a new hotel in Ayodhya
description: Espire Hospitality Group plans to launch a new hotel in Ayodhya in Q4 2024, featuring 150 keys, with 50 keys offering luxury boutique resort experience and 100 keys offering mid-segment Country Inn Hotels and Resorts experience. The hotel will offer easy access to landmarks like Ram Janmabhoomi, Hanuman Garhi Temple, and Kanak Bhawan.
